lessonGuidance: The pattern pictured is known as the 1-3-1 corner
First looking at the one to the left of the three it borders the two pink cells meaning they can have a maximum of 1 mine
Next looking at the mine below the three it borders the two orange cells meaning these cells can also have a maximum of one mine
The three borders all of the pink and orange cells accounting for two of its three mines
The third mine only has one possible location
The pink and orange donâ€™t have a guaranteed mine without the three but due to the three a mine must be present in the pink and in the orange
Meaning the other tiles bordering the ones can be revealed
